statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_times;
SELECT delivery_address, delivery_time FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_id = 1;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time FROM delivery_times ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_address LIKE 'New%';
SELECT delivery_id, route_id FROM delivery_times WHERE route_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM delivery_times ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_address FROM delivery_times WHERE route_id = 10 ORDER BY delivery_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND route_id = 5;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_address, route_id FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT AVG(delivery_time) AS average_delivery_time FROM delivery_times;
SELECT * FROM delivery_time_data WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT delivery_address, delivery_time FROM delivery_time_data ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT order_id, route_id, delivery_address FROM delivery_time_data WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT route_id, start_time, end_time FROM route_analysis WHERE total_deliveries > 10;
SELECT delivery_address, delivery_time FROM delivery_time_data WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM delivery_time_data WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT delivery_address, delivery_time FROM delivery_time_data ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM delivery_time_data GROUP BY route_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 5;
SELECT route_id, AVG(total_deliveries) AS average_deliveries FROM route_analysis GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT delivery_address, route_id FROM delivery_time_data WHERE delivery_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY route_id ASC, delivery_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, MAX(distance_km) AS max_distance FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT analysis_id, route_id, analysis_date FROM route_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT route_id, AVG(distance_km) AS avg_distance FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY route_id HAVING AVG(distance_km) > 10;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC, distance_km ASC
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id > 10
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' OR end_location = 'City B'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, delivery_time FROM delivery_routes JOIN delivery_times ON delivery_routes.route_id = delivery_times.route_id
SELECT route_id, analysis_date FROM delivery_routes JOIN route_analysis ON delivery_routes.route_id = route_analysis.route_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point, total_distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_type, capacity, last_maintenance_date FROM delivery_vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, delivery_address, order_date FROM delivery_orders WHERE delivery_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, order_id, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_history ORDER BY delivery_date ASC, status DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE total_distance > 50 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, delivery_address, order_date FROM delivery_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT d.order_id, d.delivery_date, r.route_name, d.actual_delivery_time FROM delivery_history d JOIN delivery_routes r ON d.route_id = r.route_id WHERE d.status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY d.actual_delivery_time ASC;

SELECT o.customer_name, r.start_point, r.end_point, o.estimated_delivery_time FROM delivery_orders o JOIN delivery_routes r ON o.order_id = r.route_id WHERE o.estimated_delivery_time > 2.5 ORDER BY o.estimated_delivery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_records;
SELECT record_id, delivery_date, recipient_name FROM delivery_records;
SELECT route_id, route_name, driver_name FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT address, city, state, postal_code FROM delivery_locations WHERE state='NY';
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_time, delivery_duration FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM delivery_records;
SELECT record_id, recipient_name, delivery_status FROM delivery_records WHERE delivery_date = '2022-08-10';
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_plate_number FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM delivery_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT route_id, delivery_date, delivery_duration FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_duration > 60;
